text: Higeno Aisaia'a kenona'a amanage hu'ne, Deviti naga nofimota tamagesa anteta antahiho. Nagrama fruma huramante'na manua zankura renaheta negeta, Ra Anumzamo'ma anazanke huno arimpa fru huramante vava huno vugahie hutma tamagesa nentahita, antahigesageno'ma avame'zama eri fore'ma hanigeta kesaza zankura antahi'nogaze.
